Zend_Gdata  
Gapps  
No 
No 

Description

Represents the apps:quota element used by the Apps data API. This is used to indicate the amount of storage space available to a user. Quotas may not be able to be set, depending on the domain used. This class is usually contained within an instance of Zend_Gdata_Gapps_UserEntry.

Methods

__construct, __toString, getDOM, getLimit, setLimit, takeAttributeFromDOM,

Description

Arguments

$limit string | (optional) The limit, in bytes, for this quota. null

Return value

Description

Retrieves a DOMElement which corresponds to this element and all child properties. This is used to build an entry back into a DOM and eventually XML text for sending to the server upon updates, or for application storage/persistence.

Tags

Name Description

setLimit( string   $value, ) : Zend_Gdata_Gapps_Extension_Quota

Description

Set the value for this element's limit attribute. This is the amount of storage space, in bytes, that should be made available to the associated user.

Arguments

Name Type Description Default
$value string | The desired value for this attribute.

Return value

Type Description
Zend_Gdata_Gapps_Extension_Quota Provides a fluent interface.

takeAttributeFromDOM( DOMNode   $attribute, ) : n/a

Description

Given a DOMNode representing an attribute, tries to map the data into instance members. If no mapping is defined, the name and value are stored in an array.

Arguments

Name Type Description Default
$attribute DOMNode | The DOMNode attribute needed to be handled

Return value

Type Description
n/a n/a
